Articles.Content:
Sketched IRL.

It's not that good, but I can't do CG art at all (Nor do I have any clue on using Blender)
That's actually not that bad, better than my sketches.

It's not that good, but I can't do CG art at all (Nor do I have any clue on using Blender)

Well, I'm waiting for the .mu Blender importer/exporter to be able to import animations (for solar panel deployment and stuff) and I think I could do that ... I have a picture of it on my head, telling me that it won't be bad at all

Anyway, you have some skills ! Great work done here

It looks like the doodles I make while bored in class. I would love to make it in CG! Sadly I have the same issue SolarLiner is having, so the best I can do now is annoy the .mu Blender importer/exporter dev until he adds it.
